Text:
There is a problem with HoloEverywhere and AACDecoder (com.spoledge.aacdecoder).
When I try click play music from stream I get this:
12-11 00:17:53.078 16396-16396/com.example.appxxx E/dalvikvm? Could not find class 'android.test.mock.MockApplication', referenced from method android.support.v4.app._HoloActivity.onInit 12-11 00:19:18.759 1168-1330/? E/bt-btif? bta_av_link_role_ok hndl:x41 role:0, conn_audio:x1, bits:1, features:x824b 12-11 00:19:22.423 1168-1330/? E/bt-btif? bta_av_str_stopped:audio_open_cnt=1, p_data 74c9ad20 12-11 00:19:34.256 1168-1330/? E/bt-btif? bta_av_link_role_ok hndl:x41 role:0, conn_audio:x1, bits:1, features:x824b 12-11 00:19:37.759 16396-16538/com.example.appxxx E/AACPlayer? playAsync(): java.lang.NullPointerException at com.spoledge.aacdecoder.AACPlayer.dumpHeaders(AACPlayer.java:510) at com.spoledge.aacdecoder.AACPlayer.processHeaders(AACPlayer.java:497) at com.spoledge.aacdecoder.MultiPlayer.processHeaders(MultiPlayer.java:108) at com.spoledge.aacdecoder.AACPlayer.play(AACPlayer.java:280) at com.spoledge.aacdecoder.AACPlayer$1.run(AACPlayer.java:248) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:841) 12-11 00:19:39.071 1168-1330/? E/bt-btif? bta_av_str_stopped:audio_open_cnt=1, p_data 74c9a438 I've implemented all 4 files into lib and selected aacdecoder jar as source.
HoloEverywhere is using android v4 18 0 4
I stuck and don't know how to fix it.
I'm using Android Studio. I followed as in tutorial [here][1]
Please help what to do.
Thanks in advance.
I'm trying to be runnin on 2.3-4.4

Problem is related to changes in kiktat which was also mentioned on [StackOverflow][5] [1]: http://code.google.com/p/aacdecoder-android/source/browse/trunk/player/src/com/spoledge/aacplay/AACPlayerActivity.java [2]: http://code.google.com/p/aacdecoder-android/issues/detail?id=44 [3]: http://codecanyon.net/item/android-live-radio/3697897/comments [4]: http://code.google.com/p/aacdecoder-android/issues/detail?id=44#c14 [5]: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19738798/android-4-4-http-api-bugs
